## Descriptives for the SD Data

### Kobe & Ian
```{r}
library(mosaic)
favstats(~Kobe.Ian$SD)
gf_point(Kobe.Ian$SD~Kobe.Ian$Session)
gf_line(Kobe.Ian$SD~Kobe.Ian$Session) %>% gf_line(Kobe.Ian$`S-Delta`~Kobe.Ian$Session, color = 'red')
```
